products.name: Pro Driver X1
products.description: Advanced titanium driver with aerodynamic head design for maximum distance and forgiveness. Features adjustable loft and weight distribution for customized performance.

products.name: Precision Iron Set
products.description: 7-piece forged iron set (5-PW, SW) designed for accuracy and control. Premium steel shafts with enhanced feel and distance control for serious golfers.

products.name: Tour Pro Golf Balls
products.description: Premium 3-piece golf balls with urethane cover for exceptional spin control and soft feel around the greens. Box of 12 balls used by tour professionals.

products.name: Elite Carbon Stick
products.description: Professional-grade carbon fiber hockey stick with mid-kick point for powerful shots. Lightweight construction with enhanced puck feel and durability.

products.name: Pro Goalie Mask
products.description: Advanced protection goalie mask with carbon fiber shell and multi-density foam padding. CSA certified with superior ventilation and clear vision cage.

products.name: Speed Skates Pro
products.description: High-performance hockey skates with thermoformable boot for custom fit. Steel runners with superior edge retention and lightweight composite quarter package.

products.name: Championship Soccer Ball
products.description: FIFA-approved match ball with aerodynamic panel design for consistent flight. Durable synthetic leather construction with superior touch and control.

products.name: Professional Cleats
products.description: Premium leather soccer cleats with conical studs for optimal traction on firm ground. Lightweight design with enhanced ball control and comfort padding.

products.name: Goalkeeper Gloves Elite
products.description: Professional goalkeeper gloves with superior grip palm and finger protection. Breathable backhand with adjustable wrist closure for secure fit.

products.name: Carbon Pro Racket
products.description: High-performance tennis racket with carbon fiber frame for power and control. Optimized string pattern with comfortable grip for all playing styles.
